thread.title: Nan

author: Nan
title: Nan
text: I live in a Victorian, which means no finished basement or family room.My living room is a multipurpose room. (Victorian wallpaper and all). I've always had cheap coffee tables.I looked at this one and when it went on sale, I went for it ! It looks great, It brightens up the room. Best of all, I can keep this busy room de- cluttered.So many compliments. Goes with my acacia floors.
